translation:
Piratini, November 19, 1838.

Most Illustrious Sir

The government orders that Your Lordship

God keep Your Lordship Domingos José de Almeida Most Illustrious Sir Inácio José de Oliveira Guimarães General Commander of Police of Boqueirão

Office of the Most Excellent November 19, received on the 24th of the same month and answered on December 13. Secretariat of the Presidency of the Republic

To citizen Inácio José de Oliveira Guimarães. Chief of Police of Boqueirão. From the Ministry of the Interior, Treasury, and Justice.

Printed Copy.
